Docs.summary: Represents audio input stream used for custom audio input configurations.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Audio.PullAudioInputStream CreatePullStream (Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Audio.PullAudioInputStreamCallback callback);

static member CreatePullStream : Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Audio.PullAudioInputStreamCallback -> Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Audio.PullAudioInputStream

Docs.param: The custom audio input object, derived from PullAudioInputStreamCallback
Docs.summary: Creates a PullAudioInputStream that delegates to the specified callback interface for read() and close() methods, using the default format (16Khz 16bit mono PCM).
Docs.returns: The pull audio input stream being created.

static member CreatePullStream : Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Audio.PullAudioInputStreamCallback * Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Audio.AudioStreamFormat -> Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Audio.PullAudioInputStream

Docs.param: The custom audio input object, derived from PullAudioInputStreamCallback.
The audio data format in which audio will be returned from the callback's read() method (currently only support 16Khz 16bit mono PCM).
Docs.summary: Creates a PullAudioInputStream that delegates to the specified callback interface for read() and close() methods.
Docs.returns: The pull audio input stream being created.

Docs.summary: Creates a memory backed PushAudioInputStream using the default format (16Khz 16bit mono PCM).
Docs.returns: The push audio input stream being created.

Docs.param: The audio data format in which audio will be written to the push audio stream's write() method (currently only support 16Khz 16bit mono PCM).
Docs.summary: Creates a memory backed PushAudioInputStream with the specified audio format.
Docs.returns: The push audio input stream being created.

Docs.summary: This method performs cleanup of resources. The Boolean parameter indicates whether the method is called from (if is true) or from the finalizer (if is false). Derived classes should override this method to dispose resource if needed.
